instructions.1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Spray a 9x13 inch baking pan with nonstick spray. Stir together crushed chocolate graham snacks and the melted butter; press evenly into the bottom of the pan.
instructions.2: Bake in the preheated oven for 5 minutes. Remove from oven; layer the toffee baking bits, crushed toffee candy bars, chocolate chips, and chopped pecans evenly over the crust. Pour the sweetened condensed milk evenly over the layers.
instructions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until set, about 20 minutes. Cool overnight before cutting.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the oven from Step 1 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is crust from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 3?
Can we preheat (Step 1) and bake (Step 2) at the same time?
